# WE BUILD YouR[ COMMUNITY](https://windwalk.com/<#strategy>)
Windwalk is the industry leading community consultancy - building, growing, and operating next-generation digital communities on Discord.
###### backed by
[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624c65cb2ff6bfc8d96a54b8/6256774ee992590dced0364f_Krafton.svg)](https://windwalk.com/<#>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624c65cb2ff6bfc8d96a54b8/6256774e6afcdf7a059b3244_Y%20Combinator.svg)](https://windwalk.com/<https:/www.ycombinator.com/companies/windwalk-games/?ref=windwalk>)[![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/624c65cb2ff6bfc8d96a54b8/6256774d744ac048733506e1_1UP.svg)](https://windwalk.com/<https:/1upfund.com/portfolio/?ref=windwalk>)
## WE'LL HELP YOU
### [STrategizewith an actionable community development plan](https://windwalk.com/<#strategy>)### [BUILDwith a team to design and develop your community](https://windwalk.com/<#build>)### [GROWwith scalable techniques fit to your community’s needs](https://windwalk.com/<#growth>)### [OPErATEwith the tools you need for community management](https://windwalk.com/<#operations>)
# [strategize](https://windwalk.com/<#strategy>)# [build](https://windwalk.com/<#build>)# [Grow](https://windwalk.com/<#growth>)# [operate](https://windwalk.com/<#operations>)# [strategize](https://windwalk.com/<#strategy>)# [build](https://windwalk.com/<#build>)# [Grow](https://windwalk.com/<#growth>)# [operate](https://windwalk.com/<#operations>)
# [strategize](https://windwalk.com/<#strategy>)# [build](https://windwalk.com/<#build>)# [Grow](https://windwalk.com/<#growth>)# [operate](https://windwalk.com/<#operations>)# [strategize](https://windwalk.com/<#strategy>)# [build](https://windwalk.com/<#build>)# [Grow](https://windwalk.com/<#growth>)# [operate](https://windwalk.com/<#operations>)
###### OPERATIONS
###### [strategIZE](https://windwalk.com/<#strategy>)###### [build](https://windwalk.com/<#build>)###### [GROW](https://windwalk.com/<#growth>)###### [OPERATE](https://windwalk.com/<#operations>)
###### OPERATIONS
## Community Experts
#### RESEARCH
There are no 1-size-fits-all community plans. We analyze your product documentation and marketing timeline to understand what core goals your organization has and how a community can help.
#### SET STRATEGY
What should your community teams be doing? What KPIs should we be tracking? We draw from our expertise working with top-tier projects to develop a clear and documented community plan of attack.
#### ADAPT
We get it. It's hard to build in public. When products change or marketing timelines slip we are ready to adjust your community strategy on the fly.
## GAMify your Community
#### REWARD
We roll out your very own white-labeled community reward system. Your die-hard fans can spend loyalty points on giveaways, early access to your product, sweet merch, whatever gets them fired up.
#### ENGAGE
Deploy custom mini-games, throw digital events. We keep your community’s event calendar full of regular live programming to drive engagement and camaraderie.
#### Amplify
Once you have gathered your community, it's time to march them into battle. We build systems that drive virality: referral programs, social amplification, anything to boost your signal.
## FIND YOUr POwer USERs
#### PARTNERSHIPS
We find and run unique partnerships with subreddits, Discords, anywhere where authentic and high quality users hang out. 
#### CONTENT CREATION
We make and post shareable content that will champion your growth and heighten your product awareness.
#### OUR Network
We promote your project through our vast network of communities, projects, and influencers. 
## OPERATE YOUR community
#### Manage
Your team can stay focused because we are doing the heavy lifting. We deploy a multidisciplinary team with all the skill sets required for us to grow a successful community. 
#### moderate
We provide you with around the clock, white-glove moderation to keep your community and your brand safe.
#### Measure
We measure and clearly communicate the core metrics of your community’s growth and engagement.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/625846d0fc77aff590434c83/6258e89dc1f87bab7c94cb11_bighero.png)

generated_description:
**Windwalk: Building Communities in the Digital Age**

Founded in 2018 and hailing from Austin, TX, Windwalk is making waves as an industry leader in community consultancy. Initially part of Y Combinator's Batch W19, the company has a team of 25 employees dedicated to supporting next-generation digital communities, especially on platforms like Discord. 

At its core, Windwalk specializes in creating, developing, and managing thriving communities. They understand that no two community strategies are alike, offering customized solutions based on meticulous research and the unique goals of their clients. Their focus is not just on building communities; they also concentrate on growing them and ensuring continued engagement through innovative techniques.

Windwalk operates under a clear mission: to craft and foster engaged digital communities. They take a holistic approach, including strategy formulation, community building, growth strategies, and operational management. Their services include gamification of communities to enhance user engagement, reward systems for loyal members, and providing around-the-clock community management. 

Their leadership team consists of experienced professionals, including CEO Colin Feo, CTO Cris Feo, and Head of Community Shihan Yu, among others. The company also values partnerships and content creation to expand their reach and influence across various digital spaces.

With a focus on the gaming sector and an emphasis on creating authentic connections among users, Windwalk is positioned as a go-to consultancy for organizations looking to enhance their community presence in an increasingly digital world. Whether you're starting from scratch or looking to scale an existing community, Windwalk is there every step of the way.

For more information, visit [Windwalk's Website](https://windwalk.com).
